description: This source file defines the EventsPage widget for a Flutter app, displaying a list of events or an empty state when no events are available.

classes.name: EventsPage
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a list of events fetched from a provider or an empty state if no events exist.

classes.name: _EmptyState
classes.description: A private StatelessWidget that shows a message and icon when there are no events.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for EventsPage, either showing a list of events or an empty state.

methods.name: _EmptyState.build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the empty state message, including icon, title, and subtitle.
